ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Ensure mashed potatoes are completely cooled before mixing with egg and flour
Use leftover mashed potatoes that are not too buttery for better binding
Pan-fry over medium heat until golden on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side
enrichment.coachingPrompt: My potato cakes are falling apart when I flip them. What can I add to help bind them together better?
